6483927_style_2: PROCEDURE: Insertion of Indwelling Tunneled Pleural Catheter. The patient with metastatic ovarian cancer and recurrent right pleural effusion was positioned. Under ultrasound guidance and local anesthesia, a 15.5 French PleurX catheter was tunneled and inserted into the right pleural space. 1,100 mL of fluid was drained. The catheter functioned well and was secured.
